search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Kajabi (kajabi.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Kajabi is: [https://kajabi.com/pricing](https://kajabi.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

KICKSTARTER

Get the foundations right to set up your business.

$89/mo\*

*   0% Transaction Fee

_\*+ applicable taxes. Only available to new users._  

recommended plan

BASIC

Everything you need to start running your business.

$149/mo\*

*   0% Transaction Fee

*   Unlimited Marketing Emails

*   3 Funnels

[Get Started →](https://app.kajabi.com/signup/kajabi_basic_monthly?signup_source=kajabi_basic_monthly&marketing_form_name=start_your_trial_form)

_\*+ applicable taxes._

Products

Build & Launch

[![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d55ae4f15d384bbfe20_Favicon%201.png) Online Courses Create, market and sell your expertise.](https://kajabi.com/features/online-courses)[![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d552ea1c3a241ee4cff_Coaching%201.png) Coaching Add more value to your audience with our full suite of coaching tools.](https://kajabi.com/features/coaching)[![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d55893de0990db3b068_Email%20Marketing.png) Podcasts Create and launch your podcast.](https://kajabi.com/features/podcasts)[![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d554be2f4c3e6b5bd2d_Communities.png) Memberships Earn recurring revenue by creating an exclusive member experience.](https://kajabi.com/features/membership-sites)[![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d5650ce8eb8f1618fe1_Podcasts.png) Communities Share ideas and create a sense of belonging with thriving communities.](https://kajabi.com/features/communities)[![Image 16](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d5537f080a346e51246_Analytics.png) Newsletters Boost engagement and revenue with AI-powered newsletters.](https://kajabi.com/features/newsletters)[![Image 17](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/67a67255e96462dcc72e717a_Icon%20-%20download.svg) Digital Downloads Enjoy unlimited downloads with endless payouts.](https://kajabi.com/features/digital-downloads)

Scale

[![Image 18](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d55864444eb45ae5bf1_12.png) Branded Mobile App Grow your business and brand with your own mobile app.](https://kajabi.com/features/branded-app)[![Image 19](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d552ea1c3a241ee4c60_13.png) Landing Pages Build high-converting landing pages without needing a designer.](https://kajabi.com/features/landing-pages)[![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d5537f080a346e51246_Analytics.png) Email Marketing Draft and send marketing emails worth opening.](https://kajabi.com/features/email-marketing)[![Image 21](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d551e964b7302eacb17_11.png) Funnels & Automations Automate and scale your campaigns with ready-made funnels.](https://kajabi.com/features/funnels)[![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d557e167c8db443f933_14.png) No-Code Web Builder Create a fully integrated website with a few clicks.](https://kajabi.com/features/web-builder)

Earn & Measure

[![Image 23](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d55efcdaefa36061661_22.png) Payments Accept and manage payments right from your dashboard with Kajabi Payments.](https://kajabi.com/features/payments)[![Image 24](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d56bafa99b22d775e4d_Online%20Courses.png) Analytics & Performance Use the right metrics, organized into reports you’ll actually use.](https://kajabi.com/features/analytics)[![Image 25](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d55ce03b33be3fb7dcd_9.png) Contacts CRM Move your audience off social media and own your relationship with them.](https://kajabi.com/features/contacts)

[![Image 26](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a28e_Frame%201197145106.webp) BOOST YOUR REVENUE WITH KAJABI PAYMENTS Learn More →](https://kajabi.com/features/payments)[![Image 27: Kajabi, Online Courses for Creators, Community Building, and Payment Solutions](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66e3545807dca8b0399f9a62_Rectangle%2034648767%20(1).svg) LINK IN BIO Connect your socials, grow your audience, promote and sell, link to content, and more. **Set up your custom domain today.** Setup For Free →](https://app.kajabi.com/signup/link_in_bio_monthly)

Resources

Resources

[![Image 28](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d6fc5d4b433649dec1f_17.png) Blog](https://kajabi.com/blog)[![Image 29](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d554be2f4c3e6b5bd2d_Communities.png) Creator Stories](https://kajabi.com/creator-stories)[![Image 30](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d56a0b56de54523c28d_Memberships.png) Training Webinars](https://learn.kajabi.com/webinars)[![Image 31](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d552ea1c3a241ee4c60_13.png) Free Guides & Downloads](https://learn.kajabi.com/downloads)[![Image 32](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d55893de0990db3b068_Email%20Marketing.png) The Creator's Playbook Podcast](https://learn.kajabi.com/podcast)[![Image 33](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d5650ce8eb8f1618fe1_Podcasts.png) Creator Class](https://kajabi.com/creator-class)[![Image 34](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66aebc00ad11d5f27673a187/66df4d5537f080a346e51246_Analytics.png) Creator CEO Club Newsletter](https://kajabi.com/newsletter)

[Go to Learning Hub →](https://learn.kajabi.com/)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

[Get Started →](https://kajabi.com/pricing#)

### What is Kajabi?

Kajabi is an all-in-one knowledge commerce platform that has helped over 75 million customers launch more than 100,000 businesses, turning their passions and skills into successful online courses, membership sites, coaching programs, podcasts, and more.

‍

And when we say all-in-one, we mean it. With Kajabi, you have all the tools you need to create, market, and sell professional digital products from the same dashboard — no messy integrations or prior tech skills required.

### Why choose Kajabi?

**Creators** created Kajabi **for** **creators**, so we're familiar with the challenges faced by today's online business owners. With over a decade in the industry, we've helped our customers collectively earn over **$8 billion** in revenue from digital products.

‍

When you choose Kajabi, you're choosing a platform with a proven track record and a culture obsessed with your success. That means you can expect constant platform enhancements and best-in-class customer support as you build and scale your business.

‍

And if you’re not so great at the tech side of things, you’re in the right place. Kajabi was created specifically for non-techie people to help them achieve entrepreneurial success online.

‍

[**Explore our Creator Stories →**](https://kajabi.com/creator-stories)

### How does Kajabi help me build my business?

Kajabi gives you all the tools you need to run your business, plus guidance and support every step of the way.

‍

You're never starting from scratch on Kajabi. We have customizable templates, blueprints, and intuitive design tools that allow you to easily create professional digital products, websites, landing pages, emails, sales funnels, and more.

‍

Top it all off with our built-in CRM, powerful analytics, and a ready-made mobile app, and you have everything you need to build and scale the online business you've been dreaming about—all from one platform.

‍

[**Explore our Templates →**](https://templates.kajabi.com/)

### Can I outgrow Kajabi?

Your Kajabi account is designed to grow with you. With multiple plan tiers, you can choose the one that best suits your needs and change at any time.

‍

You'll also have easy-to-read metrics to optimize your business for growth, a robust library of resources, and a supportive community to help you take your business to the next level.

‍

[**See our Pricing →**](https://kajabi.com/pricing)

### How does Kajabi compare with other knowledge commerce platforms?

Other platforms give you the tools to create an online course, but you'll have to look elsewhere for websites, landing pages, email marketing, etc.

‍

**Kajabi is an all-in-one solution that helps you simplify your process and maximize your results. With everything you need to create, market, and sell digital products on the same dashboard, you'll save time, money, and the tech headache associated with integrating multiple tools.**

‍

Other platforms take a % cut of your revenue. The more you earn, the more you have to pay them.

‍

**At Kajabi, we believe that's your money. You earned it, and you should keep it. We don't take a cut.**

‍

Choosing Kajabi also means joining a thriving and supportive community like no other. If you get stuck, you'll get help to get you back on track. When you reach a new milestone, we celebrate with you and send you rewards to mark your achievements. That's all part of our culture: we champion your success.

‍

[**See our Pricing →**](https://kajabi.com/pricing)

### Can I cancel my Kajabi subscription at any time?

Of course! If you decide that Kajabi isn't the right fit for your business, you can easily cancel your account from your dashboard at any time.

‍

[**See our Pricing →**](https://kajabi.com/pricing)

### Does Kajabi take a cut of my revenue?

Unlike our competitors, Kajabi **does not** take a percentage of your revenue. We do however, have standard processing fees that are commensurate with other payment processors.

‍

**Kajabi Payments Processing**

‍

When you use [**Kajabi Payments**](https://kajabi.com/kajabipayments) to process your payments, you'll be charged a processing fee for every successful transaction. Kajabi charges an industry-standard processing fee comparable with other major payment processors.

‍

With Kajabi Payments, you benefit from competitive fees while offering your customers flexible payment options like [**Apple Pay, Google Pay**](https://help.kajabi.com/hc/en-us/articles/14958140304411-How-to-Enable-Apple-Pay-on-Kajabi-Payments-Offers), and [**Buy Now, Pay Later**](https://help.kajabi.com/hc/en-us/articles/18239019426715-Buy-Now-Pay-Later) solutions such as [**Cash Afterpay**](https://help.kajabi.com/hc/en-us/articles/17939376766491-Afterpay) and [**Klarna**](https://help.kajabi.com/hc/en-us/articles/25844797358619-How-to-Enable-Klarna-with-Kajabi-Payments) — making checkout easier and helping boost your sales.

‍

**Kajabi Payments Fees by Country**

‍

For a better understanding of the fees associated with Kajabi Payments, please review the links below based on the country in which your business is registered:

‍

[**United States**](https://help.kajabi.com/hc/en-us/articles/23370972909851-Kajabi-Payments-Fees-United-States)

[**United Kingdom**](https://help.kajabi.com/hc/en-us/articles/26260006915227-Kajabi-Payment-Fees-United-Kingdom)

[**Australia**](https://help.kajabi.com/hc/en-us/articles/23147888973851-Kajabi-Payment-Fees-Australia)

[**Canada**](https://help.kajabi.com/hc/en-us/articles/23147908635931-Kajabi-Payments-Fees-Canada)

### Can I use Kajabi on mobile devices?

Yes, you can use Kajabi on mobile devices. Kajabi offers a mobile app available for both iOS and Android, which allows users to access their courses, memberships, and other digital products on the go. The app is designed for both creators and customers, enabling you to manage your Kajabi site, engage with your audience, and consume content directly from your mobile device.

‍

For creators, the mobile app offers features like monitoring your business, checking analytics, managing products, and interacting with your audience. For customers, it provides a seamless way to access and consume the content you provide, such as courses, podcasts, and other digital products.

‍

Kajabi also provides a [**Branded App experience**](https://kajabi.com/features/branded-app) to increase your brand credibility and customer engagement.

### Does Kajabi support integrations with other tools or platforms?

Yes, Kajabi supports integrations with a wide range of tools and platforms, making it a versatile choice for businesses that rely on multiple software solutions. These integrations help you automate processes, enhance your marketing efforts, and streamline your operations.

‍

[**Learn more about Integrations →**](https://help.kajabi.com/hc/en-us/articles/360043873353-Third-Party-Integrations)

### Still have more questions?

Visit our [**Help Center!**](https://help.kajabi.com/hc/en-us)

REady to go.


-----------------------------

Kajabi’s all-in-one, ready-to-go platform has everything your business needs. Whether you're getting started, or scaling your empire, Kajabi has you covered.

[See All Features →](https://kajabi.com/features)

### Products

Turn your content into a polished online course, subscription, or any other digital product you can imagine.

[Learn More](https://kajabi.com/features)

### Websites

Set up a fully integrated website on Kajabi that connects everything about your business in one place.

[Learn More](https://kajabi.com/features/web-builder)

### Payments

Kajabi Payments lets you process transactions, manage subscriptions, send invoices, and collect sales tax—all in one place.

[Learn More](https://kajabi.com/features/payments)

### Email

Kajabi's visual editor lets you create and customize beautiful emails that integrate video, countdown timers, and more.

[Learn More](https://kajabi.com/features/email-marketing)

### Pages

Build dynamic landing pages without a designer. Pick a template, customize, and hit publish without worrying about tech.

[Learn More](https://kajabi.com/features/landing-pages)

### Funnels

Optimize and scale your business with Kajabi's fully automated marketing campaigns and funnels.

[Learn More](https://kajabi.com/features/funnels)

### Analytics

Data alone isn't enough to grow your business. Kajabi gives you the right metrics, organized into reports you'll actually use.

[Learn More](https://kajabi.com/features/analytics)

### Contacts

Tag contacts based on their behavior and then use that in your marketing, automations, and products.

[Learn More](https://kajabi.com/features/contacts)

### Mobile

Give your customers on-the-go access to your products with your own Branded Mobile app. They'll love you for it.

[Learn More](https://kajabi.com/features/branded-app)

Learn, grow, and build together.
--------------------------------

Kajabi is much more than software, it's a powerful network of creators and Kajabi experts who are ready to share their expertise to save you time and money. We make sure you're never on your own.

[View All Resources →](https://learn.kajabi.com/)
